articles.title: Apple Watch study says you need to get more sleep - AppleInsider
articles.description: Data generated by the Apple Watch for the Apple Heart and Movement Study indicates that most people don't get enough sleep at night, and that people in Idaho get more sleep than West Virginia.
articles.content:
Wear an Apple Watch at night to see how well you sleep.
